title: Up in smoke
creator_contributor_role: British Columbia Forest Service, production company

description: Forest fire fighting in mountainous British Columbia has been developed to the precision of a military operation. Shows the whole pattern of attack, from the time smoke is sighted until the outbreak is brought under control. Includes aerial and ground attack.
